item.title: Make for Windows Developers
item.description: How do modern developers chain complex commands together to build software products? Javascript developers may tend to use NPM scripts, Windows developers may use a more object oriented approach with Powershell. However, Make is the tried and true approach for most build pipelines. With the advent of WSL, what used to be reserved for Linux developers, can now be used universally as a basic build command tool on all major operating systems.
